page.title: 17TRAFFIC SURVEY ALSAGER.
page.content: { On July 1st 1985 we did a survey of the {A5011}which is a busy main road linking Butt Lane-Church Lawton. Our square is mainly agricultural except for this busy road which leads to the motorway, Talke and the factories. We surveyed the traffic for 5 minutes and then we found the average of traffic for one hour. These are the results made into a chart. in 5 mins in one hour {Pedestrians 2 24 {Vans 9 108 {Cars 68 816 {Lorries 6 72 {Motorbikes 2 24 We saw no one riding a bike. Although we saw no buses we did look at a bus time-table. The buses run from Hanley- Radway Green or to Sandbach. About 7-8 buses go past Linley Stores each day.
